title: Strengthening HR Management Competencies: Online Strategies for Developing Mobile-Based Self-Regulated Learning (SRL)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three-stage self-regulated learning process (planning-execution-evaluation) in mobile environments
Learners adhere to explicit evaluation criteria (clarity, specificity, actionability) at 80% or higher when writing peer feedback
Learners can visualize and track their learning progress within a week using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
